page.title: 11VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The largest event in the village is the annual Church FLOWER FESTIVAL held over five days at the end of May or the beginning of June. In addition to the floral displays in the church there are stalls and competions which are held in the church grounds. THE PARISH HALL committee organise for themselves tombola evenings each week for most of the years.Other clubs and organisations hold similar events with the weeks before Christmas often having three nights of tombola. THE ANTHONY CURTON AIDED SCHOOL PARENT TEACHER AND FRIENDS ASSOCIATION holds,towards the end of June,a Sports Day and and Fete in the school grounds.This event is held on a Saturday with every child taking part in the races.Following the races there
